children.name: Logged in: Placing order with saved cc- promo code
Account - Create Account - Validate the account Creation in Create Account Page for Guest Users
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify the applied promo code shows in red and Remove option is shown as well

Cart Drawer - Adding a product with variations to the cart - Verify Choose Options drawer gets open when user click on add to cart against a product which has multiple variants from PLP and after adding to cart Cart Drawer opens
Verify add/edit New Address - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping scenario
Verify Payment Method Radio Buttons - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
